name: Vaccinal War
description:
In this game you have to dodge syringes of doctors who wants to VACCINE YOU against your will. Since they can't, policemen will attack you with their FLASHBALLS ! Dodge, dodge, dodge and survive until you meet the VIPs behind this situation !

Credits : 

Design : SeiferSJ

Programmation : Rafabinda

Music : Gauloises

Sound design : Gauloises, Panthere, Alice, SeiferSJ

English translation : Panthere

Concept : The whole crew

Tip : If the game is too hard for you, you can regen your life and your vaccine doses with space bar so you can enjoy the story !
